result.eng: Would you mind helping me to move this table?
result.ga: Ar mhiste leat cuidiú liom an tábla seo a bhogadh
result.orig: Ar mhiste leat cuidiú liom an tábla seo a bhogadh
result.html: Ar mhiste leat cuidiú liom an tábla seo a bhogadhWould you mind helping me to move this table?
result.ponchtml: Ar ṁiste leat cuidiú liom an tábla seo a ḃogaḋWould you mind helping me to move this table?

result.eng: Would you mind? - No I wouldn't.
result.html: Ar mhiste leat - Níor mhisteWould you mind? - No I wouldn't.
result.ponchtml: Ar ṁiste leat - Níor ṁisteWould you mind? - No I wouldn't.

result.eng: Going there would do no harm.
result.html: Níor mhiste dul annGoing there would do no harm.
result.ponchtml: Níor ṁiste dul annGoing there would do no harm.

result.eng: I wouldn't mind winning the lottery.
result.ga: Níor mhiste liom an crannchur a bhuachan
result.orig: Níor mhiste liom an crannchur a bhuachan
result.html: Níor mhiste liom an crannchur a bhuachanI wouldn't mind winning the lottery.
result.ponchtml: Níor ṁiste liom an crannċur a ḃuaċanI wouldn't mind winning the lottery.

result.eng: Would you mind waiting a minute?
result.html: Ar mhiste leat fanacht nóiméadWould you mind waiting a minute?
result.ponchtml: Ar ṁiste leat fanaċt nóiméadWould you mind waiting a minute?
